website_summaries.verdict: Nothing fancy, just a quality furniture cover that works.
pros: Fabric has a heavy, quality feel
Double stitched seams prevent leakage during heavy rainfall
Extra tall cover can be used on a stack of small chairs
Easy to put on and take off
Fabric can withstand long sun exposure without fading or cracking
cons: Cover is only available in one size

customer_reviews.title: comes with straps for easy carrying and snap-in cinch straps that wrap chairs tightly ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding quality, rugged, thick, comes with straps for easy carrying and snap-in cinch straps that wrap chairs tightly at the bottom. My chairs were very high (39" ) and they fit perfecty to bottom. Excellent price and better made than more expensive and less quality ones I've seen out there. Don't know how such a great quality product can be sold at such a very reasonable price, but I'll take it. Quick delivery. Will definitely buy Utopia Brand again, and strongly recommend this poduct for any person or business looking to protect their outdoor furniture from the elements .
customer_reviews.author: john t maffei

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the chair cover for an odd sized outdoor wooden rocking chair we have. I ordered outdoor covers for our furniture from 3 different companies and this one is by far the best. Upon opening, I could feel that it was a significantly heavier weight and the seams were noticeably more durable. In addition to all of these positives, it fit! I even had room to leave the decorative pillow underneath for winter storage. Although this cover was a but pricier, it was worth every penny as I feel certain that it will last many seasons. If this should prove to not be the case, i will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Dona R.

customer_reviews.title: Big improvement from our previous covers
customer_reviews.text: We are pleased with its big improvement versus our previously used reinforced vinyl covers. Our chairs are large rockers with very sharp corners. With vinyl covers we needed to be very careful to prevent tears. These covers have a generous fit and are much more puncture resistant. This encourages us to keep chairs covered rather than constantly exposed.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Tanton

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE quality, starts tearing within months.
customer_reviews.text: If you want to spend way too much money on a cover that will last less than 1 year, this is the cover for you. We bought these to cover the chairs during the winter and then discovered that both covers tore along the entire side, NOT on the seam. Just really crappy fabric that started tearing with no provocation other than regular weather hazards that these are supposed to be designed for. Terrible terrible product. We currently have them duct taped up until we can find a better replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony & Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: The best covers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these covers a while ago to protect 2 outdoor chairs for the winter. At the same time I bought 2 covers from another manufacturer to cover 2 love seats. Yesterday I began "spring cleaning" and I took the covers and to my dismay the love seat covers from the other manufacturer were discolored and totally ripped. My Utopia seat covers were percent and totally protected my 2 chairs. I know there are less expensive chair covers on this site as you browse but if you are looking for heavy, well constructed, strong chair covers to 100% protect your outdoor furniture you can do no better than this Utopia product.
customer_reviews.author: rob b.

customer_reviews.title: extremely well-made
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as promised, the other reviewers don't lie! Very heavy duty fit my oversized swivel chairs very well. I will be ordering more for my front porch rockers, but probably in a medium as they are smaller chairs.
customer_reviews.author: J. Riordan

customer_reviews.title: Your covers were perfect. We could not find one of yours to ...
customer_reviews.text: Your covers were perfect. We could not find one of yours to cover our larger love seat however so bought one on amazon from another manufacture, and what a difference, That one won't last long in our wind here. We love yours however, and would buy it again in a second. Thanks for making a great product. Larry and Nancy
customer_reviews.author: Larry Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Could not believe the quality and utility of this cover. First please note that these are for ‘stackable ‘ chairs. I purchased two- one for me and one for our daughter. We have the metal lawn chairs of old with the ‘u’ shaped metal legs. One of these covers went over two chairs and a small table in between. I can’t believe the price for this kind of quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline M Scharer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier that I ordered these. Had searched for a long time but covers were too expensive. THEN I found these! They are affordable, durable, sturdy and best of all...waterproof! I no longer have to bring all my cushions in from the rain, just throw the cover on. SO please with this purchase, highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: anr

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical at First
customer_reviews.text: We invested in a high end firepit set for an open outdoor setting, needing chair covers right away. Came across the Utopia brand purchased 4 covers, delivered with 2 day prime shipping. It has rained heavily with high winds for days on end. Beyond pleased to find our upholstered chair cushions were completely dry! Would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: M&B Newman

customer_reviews.title: Keeps all my cushions dry!
customer_reviews.text: Super good quality and sewing. Has a lot of reinforcement and are heavy weight with an adjustable cord to tighten at the bottom. Recommend highly - we have had too much rain this year and they look great through my patio door onto the lanai. We have UV protection but not rain!
customer_reviews.author: webers

customer_reviews.title: These are good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these for the rocking chairs on my deck. They're not a precise fit, but that's not the fault of the covers. They are heavy duty and will keep my chairs & cushions out of the elements. The tables also fit upsidedown on the seat of the rockers where they are protected from the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette Speck

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate Protection
customer_reviews.text: I must say this is a lot sturdier and nicer than I would have ever expected. Also it's big enough to put over 2 swivel chairs. Just stack one swivel chair seat on the other swivel chair seat and it fits perfectly over the both of them. Not to mention they got great velcro straps at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Wildcattom

customer_reviews.title: like the buckles that allow tie-down of the cover to ...
customer_reviews.text: Rugged material - and water PROOF --- based on 4" rainfall, where rain puddled in the seat of the chairs protected. So, I just cinched up the cover -- no opportunity to puddle in rain/snow to some....like the buckles that allow tie-down of the cover to the legs of the chairs.
customer_reviews.author: S. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Great investment!
customer_reviews.text: Omg !!!! These are awesome , thick and perfect size to protect my outdoor furniture... we had rain almost every day and my cushions were DRY !!! When I buy more outdoor furniture will definitely be buying more of these covers 😀
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Godwin

customer_reviews.title: Look good
customer_reviews.text: It is too early to determine the durability, sturdiness and therefore value, and the covers have only been on for a couple of days. The fit well , look great, and are as described. They look like they will be excellent, but I'll give it a year before I pass judgement.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Dry Cushions
customer_reviews.text: These are great covers. I have very large wicker swivel, rocker chairs and they cover completely. Water beads up on the surface, and when I remove them the cushions are dry. They are a nice weight material. Not flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold up
customer_reviews.text: I bought two in May and it is now August and they did not hold up. Ripped and just not worth the money. just over 4 month and I will have to replace them
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: As our patio is covered, we didn't really need a heavy-duty cover, but these covers are really well-constructed and made of extremely durable appearing fabric. At this price, you absolutely can't go wrong!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann M.

customer_reviews.title: Well made and a great deal
customer_reviews.text: I am super happy with these. They are well made. The exterior has a nice tough surface and the inside is rubberized. They fit my large patio swivel chair-type very well.
customer_reviews.author: Ken M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing deal
customer_reviews.text: These covers are durable and an amazing price. Keep our chairs dry and clean and fold easily under the chairs when they are in use. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Sportzchck

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely a wonderful product and great value
customer_reviews.text: Buy this product and any product with Utopia name. I bought chair covers, and grill cover and will buy more. Heavy duty, strong and durable. Fits my big chairs with ease of removal and to cover.
customer_reviews.author: JSRotz

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I’m telling for the price these are thick and cover great. I was worried since the price was so low I might be sorry but No I was so surprised. Good deal
customer_reviews.author: diane lopez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! These covers are very heavy duty and even ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! These covers are very heavy duty and even bigger than I thought they would be. I am extremely pleased with them. If I need more in the future I will definitely buy this same brand.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Garza

customer_reviews.title: Durability to be determined.
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be quality and durable product which fits my chairs well. Will be used more during winter months. Haven’t left on chairs outside yet.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: This company has a motto that their service is their best product and it is true. However, the product is top of the line also. Strong material with good stitching.
customer_reviews.author: Harry R.

customer_reviews.title: wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these to replace some existing covers. These are much better quality and appear to be much more durable. Fit our chairs great.
customer_reviews.author: Peg Flory

customer_reviews.title: Not flimsy or cheaply constructed
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was super fast - 24 hours later it was at my doorstep. Material is thick and construction appears to be strong and well made. Of course the true test will take a whole season of summer sun, rain and humidity to determine its true usefulness, but for now I’m completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: High Quality... but heavy.
customer_reviews.text: High quality, but the size was off for my chairs... Not the company's fault. The color was also not right for our décor. Heavy material.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly Belle

customer_reviews.title: Chair cover protection
customer_reviews.text: This product was used to cover a deck rocker that stays outside during the winter. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Don M. Doney

customer_reviews.title: These are nice and thick
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and thick, but a bit long for my chair. I'd rather it be a little too big than too small, though. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim BellTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Durable!!
customer_reviews.text: Best outdoor furniture cover i have purchased. Sturdy easy to adjust. Will consider buying more.
customer_reviews.author: S.A.Marino

customer_reviews.title: Must buy if you have outdoor furniture!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, even better price. I highly recommend if you have outdoor furniture
customer_reviews.author: Corley B.

customer_reviews.title: Excelkent
customer_reviews.text: These chair covers are very nice! Great quality at an affordable price. I love them
customer_reviews.author: Hallie Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Best furniture cover ever!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the quality of this cover! It’s a good weight and covers easily. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris McG

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and color I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and color I wanted. Bought for an oversized Restoration Hardware chair from 10+ years ago. Seems durable (time will tell). Was trying to match color of existing cover I have. Color is well represented in the pics as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Julia A Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor patio chair covers
customer_reviews.text: Very well made chair covers! Easy to open and use! Material and construction of covers is excellent. Definitely worth the price. Would buy this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Camille Becker

customer_reviews.title: A++ Product
customer_reviews.text: Buy these without any worry. We bought them for our wicker chairs, and they are super nice. Material is very strong. I would completed recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for large patio chairs
customer_reviews.text: Great chair covers and fit our large wicker swivel chairs perfectly. Wind doesn't seem to bother the heavy fabric. We received them promptly as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kochan

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: Very well made for a very reasonable price. Will order another one.
customer_reviews.author: Wynbeardies

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: These worked well to protect our furniture from the snow and ice we had this past winter.
customer_reviews.author: RBreinich

customer_reviews.title: You can’t find a better quality at twice the price!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these large chair protectors for our Adirondack rocking chairs. I cannot say enough about the outstanding quality. I was concerned that the size might not adequately cover the chairs, but they are a perfect fit with a bit of room to spare. I’m going to order covers for our remaining patio chairs.
customer_reviews.author: PATTY M.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good..
customer_reviews.text: So far so good... The biggest issue we normally have is dry rotting in the sun. Furniture is now covered by a canopy AND the cover itself. I'm sure it'll last longer now with less direct sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Sacco

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value and Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought the large chair cover to check out the quality. Very nice heavy cover to protect your outdoor furniture from the elements. I've reordered several times now to cover all my outdoor furniture. On my second season and the covers are still in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: G. Young

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Well made with heavy fabric and roomy enough to cover my two wicker chairs very well fom the rain!
customer_reviews.author: Beany

customer_reviews.title: otherwise I love them. One drawback is I had to pay ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be very heavy duty. I have a total of 9 now. Only time will tell how long they will last, otherwise I love them. One drawback is I had to pay $6.00 more for each one, (the last 5 I purchased)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Tom CCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value and great product. The material is very sturdy and the stitching is heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, heavy duty fabric. Cover fits well and will likely stand up well to the elements.
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: Great quality !
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Delivered on time and was pleasantly surprised at the quality. Nice touches like the clips to secure it to the outdoor furniture and the draw-cord to keep it tight on the chairs. Had previously looked at other brands that weren't as nice for a lot more money.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mirsch

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy material, well made. Size is just as it states. Definitely would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A. Richard

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are really high quality. Pretty hard to believe they go for half of what I have seen competitors charge. They fit perfectly and look great.
customer_reviews.author: shrich2

customer_reviews.title: Wide cover for wider chairs.
customer_reviews.text: Other than that they arrived a day later than they said they are great
customer_reviews.author: Jacci C.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality materials
customer_reviews.text: This cover is made of quality canvas double stitched very durable not cheaply made at all , going to but more covers!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy cover
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy sleek looking cover with strong ties to keep top and bottom of furniture dry
customer_reviews.author: michael demeo

customer_reviews.title: Keeps them dry.
customer_reviews.text: Thick, good quality. Roomy on our Frontgate metal swivel dining chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong, durable material
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! These seat covers are large, and durable. I’m thrilled with this product!
customer_reviews.author: TDV

customer_reviews.title: good color. Chris
customer_reviews.text: Not quite ready to put on chairs, but well packed, solid material, good color. Chris, Summit, NJ
customer_reviews.author: Christine S Smith

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and size is just right for my rocking chair.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kho

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made. Wish I could get it in the love seat size.
customer_reviews.author: K. Petersen

customer_reviews.title: This was one of the best on line Shoppe experiences we have had in long ...
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the best on line Shopping experiences we have had in long time. The quality of your covers even surpassed our expectations, Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Robert Price

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality.
customer_reviews.text: A real heavy duty cover, with a great price point.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Fits our outdoor swivel rockers great and is very rugged and durable! Wish the same brand came in a couch cover.
customer_reviews.author: Brad N Schumann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best cover I have ever purchased...I will be looking for this brand again...
customer_reviews.author: REM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the quality is the best that I have seen. I would recommend your product to anyone. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks good fits welll. Won’t know about durability for six months On time delivery
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product, large enough to cover six chairs. Like the straps to keep it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Amrhein

customer_reviews.title: Everything we hoped for in an outdoor chair cover, we bought 2.
customer_reviews.text: These are roomy; our chairs are large, square swivel rockers and the covers fit completely over them even with the oversized cushions left on. The covers are very heavy duty and stiff (at first) when using the drawstring to secure the bottom, we also use the clips to secure the cover to one of the chair leg braces. The covers have been used in rain & high winds and didn't blow off. They easily wipe clean from lots of flower blossoms one of our trees shed this time of year.
customer_reviews.author: JaSonn

product_meta.title: Utopia Home Outdoor Furniture Covers with 35 Inches High Double Stitching - Water Resistant Outdoor Chair Covers (Single Pack, Large)
